pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar

yongs su mi rtog go/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba dang /

ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/

bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya

ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su

rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan

ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ nang

stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ nang stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod

ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba

dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag

ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma

ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar

yongs su rtog go/ phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar

yongs su rtog go/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma

ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes

bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang /

bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod

ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stong pa

nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chen po

stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go// chen po stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chen po stong pa

nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chen po stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs

su rtog go/ chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su

rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su

rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi

zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug

bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang /

stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid

zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bde

zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus ma byas

stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su

rtog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtog ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya

bar yongs su rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog

go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang /

dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/

thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya

bar yongs su rtog go/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/

thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag

ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba

dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dor ba

pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs

su rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces

bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /

mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid

dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/

chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya

bar yongs su rtog go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chos thams cad stong pa

nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang gi

mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces

bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben

zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ pa stong pa nyid

bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ pa stong pa

nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog

go/ pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya

bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang /

stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dngos po pa stong

pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar

yongs su rtog go/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar

yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /

mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/

dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug

bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dran pa nye bar

gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa

ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag

ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yang

dag par spong ba rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar

yongs su rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi

dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams bdag

ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa

rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya

bar yongs su rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dbang po rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dbang po rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes

bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dbang po rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dbang po rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dbang po rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya

bar yongs su rtog go/ dbang po rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dbang po rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dbang po rnams mtshan ma yod

ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dbang po rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ dbang po rnams

dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stobs rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stobs rnams

bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stobs rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stobs rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stobs rnams mtshan

ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stobs rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ stobs rnams

dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su

rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya ba dang /

stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan

lag rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su

rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

brgyad pa sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma

ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i

lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes

bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong

zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /

smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams rtag

ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams

sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam

gtan rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/

tshad pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ tshad pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ tshad pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/

tshad pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ tshad pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ tshad pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su

rtog go/ tshad pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ tshad pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ tshad pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/

gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

rnams bdag ces bya ba dang bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya

bar yongs su rtog go/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs

su rtog go/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar

pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su

rtog go/ rnam par thar pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan

ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar

pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes

bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug ces bya

ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /

mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang /

ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa rtag ces bya

ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan

ma pa dang / smon pa pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog

go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa mtshan ma yod

ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa

nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/

mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs

su rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /

mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mngon par

shes pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya

bar yongs su rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar

yongs su rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya ba

dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba dang /

sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya

ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzungs kyi

sgo rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya ba dang dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stobs rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug

ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dben zhes bya ba dang /

dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya ba

dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'jigs pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtag go/ 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtag go/ 'jigs pa rnams

mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'jigs pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/

'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya

bar yongs su rtog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ so so yang

dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /

smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byams pa chen

po rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byams pa chen po bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byams pa chen po bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byams pa chen po sdug

ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byams pa chen po stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byams pa chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byams pa chen po smon pa

yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byams pa chen po zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ byams pa chen po dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba dang /

rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ snying rje chen po bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ snying rje chen po bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ snying rje chen po sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug

ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ snying rje chen po stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ snying rje chen po smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa

ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ snying rje chen po dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces

bya bar yongs su rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ sangs rgyas

kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /

mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar

yongs su rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya

bar yongs su rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/

thams cad shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su

rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba

dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/

lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes

bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba

dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ de lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ chos 'di dag la/ yongs su rtog pa pa'i tshul gyis/ de ltar yongs su rtog go// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i

phyir/ de skad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par

shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ma yin/ rna ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba ma yin/ sna'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa

de ni/ sna ma yin/ lce'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce ma yin/ lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus ma yin/ yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa

gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ sgra'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sgra ma yin/ dri'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dri ma yin/ ro'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ro ma yin/ reg gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ reg ma yin/ chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa

de ni/ chos ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa

ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa

ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus

te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te

reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor

ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes

pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang

yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ sa'i khams

kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ chu'i khams ma yin/ khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ me'i khams ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams ma yin/

nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ ma rig pa'i ma

skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ dang gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dang gzugs

ma yin/ skye mched drug gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched drug ma yin/ reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ reg pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin/ sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sred pa ma

yin/ len pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ len pa ma yin/ srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ srid pa ma yin/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba ma yin/ rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rga shi ma yin zhes zer/

tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin

pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma

skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/

'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong

pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/

chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/

pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes

pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin/

yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po

rnams ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa

de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ tshad

pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshad pa rnams ma yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de

ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i ma

skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi

ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin//

'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa chen po ma

yin/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/

thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/ zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi ma

skyes pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshor ba ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'du shes ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed ni 'du byed

kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'du byed ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa

de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ni gis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ma yin te/

skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba ni rna bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/

rna ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rna ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna ni snas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sna'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sa ra dwa ti'i

bu/ lce ni lces stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lce'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lce ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus ni lus kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus ma yin te/

skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus ma yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid ni yid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na

yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa

de gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sgra ni sgras stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sgra ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sgra'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dri ni dris stong ste/

gang stong pa de ni dri ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dri'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dri ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ro ni ros stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rom yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ ro'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rom yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ reg ni reg gis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rig ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ reg gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de reg ma

yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos ni chos kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chos ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chos ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gi

rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gi rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rna

pa'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sna'i rnam par shes

pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/

lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes

pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gi 'dus te reg pa ni gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong

pa de ni gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus

te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i

'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te

reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa

gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/

lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/

gang stong pa de ni gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/

rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma

skyes pa gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa

gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sa'i khams

kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sa'i khams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/

chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chu'i khams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ khams ni khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni khams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ khams

kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de khams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes

pa gang yin pa de rlung gi khams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ nam mkha'i khams

kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu

rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ma rig pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'du byed ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/

'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/

rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dang gzugs ni dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dang gzugs ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam

grangs des na/ ming dang gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dang gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

rnam grangs des na/ skye mched drug gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de skye mched drug ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ reg pa ni reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni reg pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ reg pa'i ma

skyes pa gang yin pa de reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshor ba ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sred pa ni sred pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sred pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sred pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ len pa ni

len pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni len pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ len pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de len pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni

srid pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba ni skye bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni skye ba ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de skye ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rga shi ni rga shis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rga shi ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rga shi'i ma

skyes pa gang yin pa de rga shi ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sbyin

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba do//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang

stong pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam

grangs des na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid

kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa

nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang

stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid

stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chen po

stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ don dam pa stong pa

nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu

rnam grangs des na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin te/

skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ thog ma dang tha ma

pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dor ba pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin

te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/

gang stong pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa

nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ pa stong pa nyid ni pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/

pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dngos po pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/

gang stong pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid ni dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang

yin pa de dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni

yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin te skye pa do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu

'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no// tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni stobs rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma

skyes pa gang yin pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin te skye

ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags

pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma

yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa

gang yin pa de bsam gtan rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshad pa rnams ni tshad pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshad pa rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des

na/ tshad pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshad pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa

rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin te skye ba do//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid

dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma yin te skye ba do//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra

dwa ti'i bu/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de

mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ ting nge 'dzin

rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam

grangs des na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

'jigs pa rnams ni 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'jigs pa rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs

des na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni byams pa chen po ma yin te skye ba do//

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni snying rje chen po ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de

ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu/ thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de thams cad
