shes pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/

lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du/ gzugs kyi

'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam

par shes pa ma yin/ gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni ma yin/ rna ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin/ sna'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sna ma yin/ lce'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin/ lus kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin/

yid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ sgra'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sgra ma yin/ dri'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni dri ma yin/ ro'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni ro ma yin/ reg gi 'grib pa

gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin/ chos kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin/ gi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/

sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/

yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/

rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi

'dus te reg pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i

'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin/ khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni khams

ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ ma rig pa'i 'grib

pa gang yin pa de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dang gzugs ma yin/ skye mched

drug gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched drug ma yin/ reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ reg pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin/ sred pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sred pa ma yin/ len pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de

ni len pa ma yin/ srid pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin/ skye ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba ma yin/ rga shi'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib

pa gang yin pa de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid

kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi

'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/

pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid ma yin/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin/ yang dag par spong

ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po rnams ma yin/ stobs

rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam

yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ tshad pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang

yin pa de ni/ tshad pa rnams ma yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa

rnams ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i 'grib pa

gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/

ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ 'jigs pa rnams

kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa chen po ma yin/ snying rje

chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ thams cad

shes pa nyid ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes

zer// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis

su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /

'du byed gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa

bltar pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang

yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / lce gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang / gnyis su

byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa bltar pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan

nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /

dri gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / reg gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang

yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa bltar pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//

'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i

rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa

dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa bltar

pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /

gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis

su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin

pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa bltar pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/

ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa bltar pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa

dang / chu'i khams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / khams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa

gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan

pa yang ma yin/ ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa bltar pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa

gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / dang gzugs gang yin pa dang /

gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang

yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / sred pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / len pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa

gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi gang
yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa bltar pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//

'grib pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs

pa bltar pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin

pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang

yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin

pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /

gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin

pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang

yin pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / dngos

po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa bltar pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid

gcig pa'o// 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang /

'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /

stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang

yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar

pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshad pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang /

'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa

gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang

yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa

yang ma yin/ ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa bltar pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa

gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / 'jigs pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib

pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa bltar pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//

'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa

gang yin pa dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rang byang chub

gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa bltar pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib pa gang yin

pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad

kyang ldan pa yang ma yin ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa bltar pa thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang

gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa

ma yin/ gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang ma yin/ rna ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rna ba ma yin/ sna'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sna ma yin/ lce'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lce ma yin/ lus kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lus ma

yin/ yid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang yid ma yin/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ sgra'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sgra ma yin/ dri'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang dri ma yin/ ro'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang ro ma yin/ reg

gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang reg ma yin/ chos kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang chos ma yin/ gi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rna ba'i rnam par shes

pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lus kyi rnam par

shes pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rna ba'i 'dus

te reg pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa

ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor

ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang

yin pa de yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang chu'i khams ma yin/ khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang khams ma yin/ rlung gi

khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rlung gi khams ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ ma rig pa'i

'grib pa gang yin pa de yang ma rig pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang

dang gzugs ma yin/ skye mched drug gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang skye mched drug ma yin/ reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang regs ma yin/ tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang tshor ba ma yin/ sred pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sred pa ma yin/

len pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang len pa ma yin/ srid pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang srid pa ma yin/ skye ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang skye ba ma yin/ rga shi'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rga shi ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i

'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa

gang yin pa de yang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa

gang yin pa de yang don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa

stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang dor ba

pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin

pa de yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang dngos po pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams

ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang dbang po rnams ma yin/

stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang stobs rnams ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang 'phags pa'i lam yan

lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ tshad pa rnams kyi 'grib pa

gang yin pa de yang tshad pa rnams ma yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin/

mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang ting nge 'dzin rnams ma

yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de

yang 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang byams pa chen po ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin

pa de yang snying rje chen po ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes

pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du/ gang 'di gzugs zhes

bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di 'du shes zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di 'du byed ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su

byas pa'o// gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di rna ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di sna zhes bya ba de ni

gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di lce zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di lus zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di yid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di

gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di sgra zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di dri zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di ro zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas
